workshops.name: Swift & iOS Programming Workshop
workshops.short: Learn to make iOS Apps using Swift & Xcode
workshops.long: Learn the basics of iOS Development using Swift & Xcode.

workshops.name: Programming 1
workshops.short: Apply the basics of Javascript & HTML
workshops.long: Apply the basics of Javascript & HTML to create basic programs

workshops.name: Programming 2
workshops.short: Learn fundamental concepts of OOP using using Javascript, HTML, CSS & Jquery
workshops.long: Combine Javascript, HTML, CSS & Jquery to create a simple browser game implementing OOP

workshops.name: Programming 3
workshops.short: Learn the fundamentals of Create.js, Node.js & SocketI.O
workshops.long: Combine Create.js, Node.js, SocketI.O with previous experience to create a 4 player multiplayer game on a local server

workshops.name: Graphic Design 1
workshops.short: Learn the Basics of Graphic Design with Adobe Photoshop & Adobe Illustrator
workshops.long: Learn the Basics of Graphic Design with Adobe Photoshop & Adobe Illustrator & create an animated Gif image

workshops.name: Graphic Design 2
workshops.short: Learn the layout of / Create web pages using Adobe Photoshop
workshops.long: Learn and understand the design layout of webpages and create your own using Adobe Photoshop

workshops.name: Graphic Design 3
workshops.short: Learn the logo creation process conceptually and practically using Adobe Illustrator
workshops.long: Learn the concept and process of logo creation and present a logo of your creation using Adobe Illustrator

workshops.name: 3D Modelling 1
workshops.short: Learn the Basics of the 3D modelling software 3DS MAX
workshops.long: Learn the Basics of the 3D modelling software 3DS MAX to create the model of an airplane

workshops.name: 3D Modelling 2
workshops.short: Learn the Basics of the 3D character creation software ZBrush
workshops.long: Learn the Basics of the 3D character creation software ZBrush and create a 3D character on your own

workshops.name: 3D Modelling 3
workshops.short: Continue working with 3DS MAX and learn the basics of texturing using Autodesk Mudbox
workshops.long: Continue working with 3DS MAX, learn the basics of texturing using Autodesk Mudbox and add texture to the airplane model

workshops.name: Web Design 1
workshops.short: Learn the basics of web design with HTML & CSS
workshops.long: Learn the basics of web design with HTML & CSS and create a sample web page on your own

workshops.name: Web Design 2
workshops.short: Learn how to work with CSS, PHP, AJAX & MySql
workshops.long: Learn and combine CSS, PHP, AJAX & MySql to create a dynamic webpage

workshops.name: Web Design 3
workshops.short: Learn to use WordPress CMS
workshops.long: Combine previous knowledge of PHP and MySql with WordPress CMS to create a webpage

workshops.name: Writing 1
workshops.short: Learn the basic elements of storytelling
workshops.long: Learn about narrative, actions, events, evironments & conflict

workshops.name: Writing 2
workshops.short: Learn to create different types of character personalities and their expressions
workshops.long: Learn to create different types of character personalities and their expressions and gain experience with different literary genres
